name: Dango (demo)
description:
This is a (demo) of the game Dango (currently in development) .   It is a 2D platform game made in pixel art with the following concept:  "You have to manipulate the platforms in order to go ahead". 

___________________________________

PLOT:

You're living a  relationship    

___________________________________

 TIPS:

The game support the gamepad and it detects it automatically (I personally suggest play with it because i think it gives a smoother experience)

___________________________________
